## NodeIterateFunc type

Iteration callback used by traversal helpers.

Return true to stop traversal early.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type NodeIterateFunc = ((node: SceneNode) => boolean) | ((node: SceneNode) => void);
```
**References:** [SceneNode](doc/markdown/./scene.scenenode.md)
